binder.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a removable cover for holding loose sheets of paper, magazines etc
binder.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a person or machine that fastens the parts of a book together
binder.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a substance that makes things stick together
binder.translation[0].definitions[3].def: an agreement in which you pay money to show that you intend to buy a property
binder.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a temporary contract that shows an agreement has been made, and is used until the formal contract has been prepared
